revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=TP-LINK |model=Archer C2 |revision=v1.x |asin=B00KATWRIY |series=AC750 |fcc_date=06/18/2014 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=Yes |availability=now |type=wireless router |fcc_id=TE7C2 |ic_id=8853A-C2 |pcb_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=MediaTek |cpu1_model=MT7620A |cpu1_cspeed=580 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model=W25Q64FVSIG |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W9751G6KB-25 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial=yes |wi1_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi1_chip1_model=MT7620A |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi2_chip1_model=MT7610E;MT7610EN; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi2_txchains=1 |wi2_rxchains=1 |wi2_sstreams=1 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Realtek |sw_model=RTL8367RB |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_boot=U-Boot; |stock_os=Linux;2.6.36; |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=TP-LINK_2.4GHz_XXXXXX, TP-LINK_5GHz_XXXXXX |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|AC750 Wireless Dual Band Gigabit Router}} :{{ProductPage|http://www.tp-link.com/en/products/details/?categoryid{{!}}2872&model{{!!}}Archer+C2}} :[http://www.tp-link.com/resources/simulator/Archer_C2/index.htm Firmware Interface] | [http://www.tp-link.com/en/support/download/?model=Archer+C2&version=V1 Downloads] | [http://www.tp-link.com/resources/document/Archer_C2_V1_User_Guide_1910010993.pdf User Guide] :[http://www.tp-link.com/en/gpl-code.html ''TP-LINK'''s GPL Code Center] (w/ [http://static.tp-link.com/resources/gpl/GPL_ArcherC2v1.tar.gz current source release])
Per ''TP-LINK'''s code tarball, this device to be using MT7620A + MT7610E. :The source code is the same as for [[TP-LINK Archer C20i]], the only :difference in kernel configuration being the ethernet switch options.
"2050500428" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :The switch used seems to be RTL8367RD / RTL8367RB. "2050500500" is silkscreened on the [https://i.imgur.com/3d6Jpmw.png main] [https://i.imgur.com/yYfY7oD.jpg board v1.1]
===Probable used PSU(s)=== The power supply shown in the FCC photos is a ''TP-LINK'' T120150-2B1.
{{hasPowerSupply |brand=TP-LINK |model=T120150-2B1 |input_v=100-240 |input_a=0.3 |input_c=AC |input_hz=50/60 |input_conn=NEMA 1-15P |output_v=12 |output_a=1.5 |output_c=DC |output_conn=barrel |style=medium, horiz. |manuf_country=China }}
==Images== <gallery caption="from TP-LINK"> File:Archer-C2(UN)1.0-A.jpg File:Archer-C2(UN)1.0-L.jpg File:Archer-C2(UN)1.0-B.jpg File:ArcherC2(UN)1.0-Box.jpg </gallery>[[Has images::external| ]]
